metadata.note: Bibliography Series editor Edward Kasinec introduces this reprint volume of two separate works - Bibliohrafiia ukrains'koi bibliohrafii and Ucrainica v zakhidno-evropeis'kykh movakh: vybrana bibliohrafiia - which represent the most significant attainments of Ievhen Iulii Pelens'kyi, one of the Ukrainian diaspora's most prominent bibilographers.
